name: Lilliput: A Miniature Game of Literary Nonsense
name_original: Lilliput: A Miniature Game of Literary Nonsense
description:
Welcome to 

Lilliput A Miniature Game of Literary Nonsense

This SHIVERS hack was created for the “2022 mini trrpg jam.” It’s premise is derived from Gulliver’s Travels, in which Gulliver washes ashore a fictional island inhabited by people no taller than six inches. In this game, player-characters are Lilliputians who serve on a council of fighters and thinkers for Emperor Mully Ully Gue, and they must solve normally mundane problems whilst no taller than a toothbrush.
